Posts.Content: Has anyone else out there had surgery waited ages for the results then find out they didnt take it all away and you have to have the surgery all over again i was in total shock horror and terror when i was diagnosed took a while and drugs to get my self to a good place then had surgery relief washed over me it was gone now 14 days later results are in they didnt get it all and what was also benign on the other side is aggressive how when i had the dye to show the tumour can they leave a lump of it there sorry if this looks like gobble de gook but i just can not get my head round to days events i am in shock
Posts.Title: still there

Posts.Content: Hello ellie thank you for your mail i think the macmillan nurses are brilliant as well but i am not a patient person i want this over and done with i dont feel i can move on i write things down to ask then forget to take them with me and now i wont see anyone till i go back on the 5th jan i had no lumps to feel it was a mammogram picked them up deep in my boobs. I hope its all over for you and this is a brilliant site for people i am in a good place a lot of the time because i know its not  going to go on for ever and the doctors will get it all but i want it done yesterday Rose xxx
Posts.Title: still there

Posts.Content: Thank you so much maggie and elibol you have put my mind at rest and i know im not the only one the way  i was rushed out of the consulting room with just a date for my next surgery no explanation i just wish the date was closer so i could move onto the next stage i feel like i am in limbo and its hard i live on my own my friends ring to see how i am but i dont want to talk cancer all the time this website is a lifeline and one again i thank you both from the bottom off my heart love to you both we are strong xxxx
Posts.Title: still there

Posts.Content: Hello maggie and elicia i will make this a short reply because my noteook crashed after my last reply i wish my doctor had explained why i had to go through it again but i was just in and out with my wounds checked and a date for my next surgery so i will be ringing the nurse tomorrow with questions thank you again and i will be thinking of you both xxxx Rose
Posts.Title: still there
